title: How do I use the event alarm?
answer:
1. Open the Huawei Wear application, go to the TalkBand B2 settings menu, and touch Event alarm. 

 2. Touch Add alarm to enter the alarm settings screen. Then set the alarm time, event name, and repeat cycle of the alarm. 

 3. Touch the check mark in the upper right corner to complete your settings. 

 Sync the alarm to the TalkBand B2 to have it activate at the alarm time. You can set five alarms at most.
